description: Lined up and ready to please, these 5 studs have a surprise in store for them. Whenever you get this many guys together, it is safe to say there will be an abundance of meat. But what if you are hankering for something sweet? Well we've got you covered there as well, as this proves to be a circle jerk with a purpose, a Game of Boners if you will. Adding drama and incentive to the proceedings, a lone chocolate muffin sits on the table in front of them, ready to absorb the 'man-glaze' and resting as a 'reward' for whoever finishes last. Five men enter. Only four will leave unchanged. Who will it be? Let the best man win, and let the last man eat cake!Enjoy!
title: Glazed Muffin
